snippet: Julie Atherton joined the New York office of SapientNitro as vice president for strategy. She succeeds Steve Zaroff, who is now the chief strategy officer at McCann Erickson New York.
lead_paragraph: Julie Atherton joined the New York office of SapientNitro as vice president for strategy. She succeeds Steve Zaroff, who is now the chief strategy officer at McCann Erickson New York.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
